success_metrics.target: ≥95% patched within SLA (Critical ≤24h, High ≤7d, Medium ≤30d); 100% MFA enforcement; Zero successful unauthorized access
success_metrics.measurement: Patching SLA: Count systems patched within SLA / total systems by severity; MFA enforcement: Count accounts with MFA / total accounts; Unauthorized access: Count successful unauthorized access attempts (from security logs)
success_metrics.data_source: Patch management system (patch deployment dates vs. vulnerability disclosure dates by severity), authentication system (MFA enrollment status per account), security logs (failed/successful authentication attempts, unauthorized access attempts)
success_metrics.frequency: Patching SLA: weekly review; MFA enforcement: daily check; Unauthorized access: continuous monitoring, weekly review
success_metrics.baseline: Patching: 70-85% within SLA pre-automation; MFA: 60-80% enforcement; Unauthorized access: 1-5 incidents per year
success_metrics.validation: Weekly patching audit (verify ≥95% systems patched within SLA Critical ≤24h/High ≤7d/Medium ≤30d); Daily MFA audit (verify 100% accounts have MFA enabled, no password-only accounts); Weekly security log review (verify zero successful unauthorized access attempts, investigate failed attempts)

success_metrics.target: 100% vendor data encrypted (at rest + in transit); Zero unauthorized access incidents; Zero data leaks
success_metrics.measurement: Encryption coverage: Automated scans verify 100% vendor data encrypted (database TDE enabled, S3/blob storage encryption enabled, TLS 1.3 enforced all connections); Unauthorized access: Count unauthorized access incidents from audit logs; Data leaks: Count data leak incidents (internal disclosure, external breach)
success_metrics.data_source: Encryption configuration scans (database TDE status, S3/blob storage encryption status, TLS version enforcement), audit logs (access attempts, authorization failures), incident reports (data leak investigations, breach notifications)
success_metrics.frequency: Encryption coverage: daily automated scans; Unauthorized access: continuous monitoring, weekly review; Data leaks: continuous monitoring, incident-based
success_metrics.baseline: Encryption: 80-95% coverage pre-enforcement; Unauthorized access: 2-10 incidents per year; Data leaks: 0-2 incidents per year
success_metrics.validation: Daily encryption scans (verify 100% vendor data encrypted at rest database TDE/S3 blob storage and in transit TLS 1.3 all connections); Weekly unauthorized access review (verify zero unauthorized access incidents from audit logs, investigate authorization failures); Quarterly penetration testing (simulate unauthorized access attempts, verify zero successful access, verify zero data leaks)

success_metrics.target: ≥95% integrations use secure credential storage; Zero credential compromises; API success rate ≥99%; 100% vendors use MFA; Zero cross-vendor data leakage; ≤1% malware in uploaded files (caught by scanning)
success_metrics.measurement: Integration security: Count integrations with credentials in secrets manager / total integrations; Credential compromises: Count credential compromise incidents; API success rate: Successful API calls / total API calls; Vendor MFA: Count vendors with MFA / total vendors; Cross-vendor leakage: Penetration testing results; Malware: Count malware detected / total files uploaded
success_metrics.data_source: Integration configuration audits (credential storage locations), security incident reports (credential compromises), API monitoring logs (success/failure rates), vendor authentication system (MFA enrollment status), penetration testing reports (cross-vendor access testing), file upload logs with malware scanning results
success_metrics.frequency: Integration security: quarterly audits; Credential compromises: continuous monitoring; API success rate: continuous monitoring, daily review; Vendor MFA: weekly check; Cross-vendor leakage: quarterly penetration testing; Malware: continuous scanning, monthly review
success_metrics.baseline: Integration security: 60-80% use secrets manager; Credential compromises: 1-3 per year; API success rate: 95-98%; Vendor MFA: 40-70%; Cross-vendor leakage: 1-3 findings per pentest; Malware: 2-5% detection rate
success_metrics.validation: Quarterly integration audit (verify ≥95% integrations use AWS Secrets Manager/HashiCorp Vault, credentials not in code/config files); Continuous credential monitoring (verify zero credential compromises, rotate compromised credentials immediately); Daily API monitoring (verify API success rate ≥99%, alert on degradation); Weekly vendor MFA check (verify 100% vendors have MFA enabled, disable accounts without MFA); Quarterly penetration testing (verify zero cross-vendor data leakage, test tenant isolation); Monthly malware scanning review (verify ≤1% malware detected caught by ClamAV/commercial scanners, quarantine all malware)

success_metrics.target: Quarterly access reviews completed; ≤5 days to revoke access on termination; 100% Critical vendors have security requirements in contracts; 100% have DPAs (if handling EU data)
success_metrics.measurement: Access reviews: Count quarterly access reviews completed / total quarters; Access revocation: Time from termination to access revoked (median, P95); Contract security: Count Critical vendors with security requirements / total Critical vendors; DPAs: Count vendors handling EU data with DPAs / total vendors handling EU data
success_metrics.data_source: Access review audit logs (review completion dates, findings, remediation), user offboarding tickets (termination date, access revocation date), contract management system (security requirement clauses, DPA status), vendor data classification (vendors handling EU data)
success_metrics.frequency: Access reviews: quarterly; Access revocation: per termination event; Contract security: annual review; DPAs: annual review
success_metrics.baseline: Access reviews: 60-80% completion rate; Access revocation: 10-30 days; Contract security: 50-75% Critical vendors have security requirements; DPAs: 60-85% compliance
success_metrics.validation: Quarterly access review audit (verify 100% quarterly reviews completed, terminated users removed ≤5 days, role assignments validated appropriate for job function); Per-termination access revocation audit (verify all vendor access revoked ≤5 days: portal accounts/VPN/API keys/integration credentials/SSO); Annual contract audit (verify 100% Critical vendors have security requirements data encryption/MFA/incident notification/audits/SBOM/subprocessor disclosure in contracts); Annual DPA audit (verify 100% vendors handling EU data have DPAs signed and up to date GDPR compliance)

success_metrics.target: 100% SBOMs encrypted at rest + in transit; 100% SBOM integrity verified (signatures/checksums); All vendor breaches assessed within ≤24 hours; Impact determined within ≤24 hours; Data deletion verified ≤30 days for terminated vendors
success_metrics.measurement: SBOM encryption: Automated scans verify 100% SBOMs encrypted at rest and in transit; SBOM integrity: Count SBOMs with verified signatures/checksums / total SBOMs; Breach assessment: Time from breach detection to assessment complete (median, P95); Impact determination: Time from assessment start to impact determination (median, P95); Data deletion: Time from vendor termination to data deletion verified (median, P95)
success_metrics.data_source: SBOM storage scans (encryption status at rest and in transit), SBOM upload logs (signature/checksum validation results), vendor breach incident tickets (detection date, assessment date, impact determination date), vendor offboarding tickets (termination date, data deletion verification date, certificate of destruction)
success_metrics.frequency: SBOM encryption: daily automated scans; SBOM integrity: per SBOM upload; Breach assessment: per incident; Impact determination: per incident; Data deletion: per vendor termination
success_metrics.baseline: SBOM encryption: 70-90% coverage; SBOM integrity: 40-70% verified; Breach assessment: 24-72 hours; Impact determination: 24-72 hours; Data deletion: 45-90 days
success_metrics.validation: Daily SBOM encryption scans (verify 100% SBOMs encrypted at rest AES-256 and in transit TLS 1.3); Per-upload SBOM integrity verification (verify 100% SBOMs have verified signatures GPG/X.509 or checksums SHA-256, reject SBOMs without verification); Per-incident breach assessment audit (verify all vendor breaches assessed within ≤24 hours detection to assessment complete, impact determined within ≤24 hours assessment to impact determination); Per-termination data deletion audit (verify data deletion verified ≤30 days for terminated vendors via certificate of destruction/audit logs showing deletion/independent audit for Critical vendors)
